title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 38.21 - Limitations on human use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 38.21 - Limitations on human use

State Regulations

No person shall use any radiation source for human use, except when such use and person are licensed or authorized by the State

Department of Health or the New York City Department of

Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
38.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
